name: "Chitty Chitty Death Bang" Online Quiz | 'Family Guy'-  Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Lois remembers Meg's first birthday, what does she not remember missing?
questions.explanation:
Meg's first sitting up.

	Lois had so much work to do in the kitchen during Meg's first birthday she ends up missing it, so she books a party at Cheesy Charlie's.

questions.text: Which pop band's bus breaks down in front of the Griffins' house?
questions.explanation:
Hanson.

	Peter accidentally mistakes the band for the Children of the Corn and shoots them with a shotgun when they ask to use a phone.

questions.text: What is the name of the girl who becomes Meg's friend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer.

	Jennifer is a member of a cult which plans to poison themselves.  Meg almost becomes a victim, but Peter saves her.

questions.text: When did Lois have to book the reservation at Cheesy Charlie's?
questions.explanation:
The day of her ultrasound.

	Peter cancels the reservation because he decides that the prices at Cheesy Charlie's are too high, but he thinks of an alternative party.

questions.text: What is the name of the clerk at the airport?
questions.explanation:
Jolene.

	Stewie tells Jolene that he needs a ticket to Nicaragua, a window seat, and an in-flight Happy Meal without pickles.

questions.text: What does Stewie do to Henry, the airport security guard?
options: He pushes him out a window
questions.explanation:
He encases him in carbonite.

	Henry gives Stewie advice about returning to fight the man in white, so he encases him in solid carbonite before leaving to fight the man in white.

Gilligan.

	Stewie mentions his middle name when he is talking to Henry at the airport.  It doesn't really affect the show all too much, but it's a neat little tidbit of information.

questions.text: What is not put into the punch at the party Meg goes to?
questions.explanation:
Pesticide.

	Meg joins the Heaven's Helpers Youth Cult not knowing that all of the members will end up killing themselves.  Peter saves her.

questions.text: What size suit does Meg say she wears?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	The Man in White asks Meg if she's a size nine, but she replies she's a size six, and he merely nods as if he's surprised.  The reason he needs her size is to get her a dark blue jogging suit which everyone in the cult wears.

questions.text: Which character has a speaking part in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Chris.

	This is Cleveland's third appearance without a speaking part.  Chris speaks numerous lines in the episode, but only played a minor role as none of the plot was about him.
